title: Some way to use the built in logger outside of the main mod class
body: i think there rlly should be some way to use `IModInterface.Logger` outside of the mod class, it would help a lot with debugging
author: z3roco01

comments.body: The mod class is your entry point, so you can just assign the logger to a static field on your mod class.

satisfaction_conditions: Provides a way to access the logger instance from classes other than the main mod class
Does not require passing logger references through method parameters
Maintains access to the original logger's functionality
